name: Intelligent

incredibly intelligent. The majority seem to be knowledgeable in                powered by P.P.E. energy/batteries made possible through techno-

   degree of human technology. Many use human weapons, equipment,                  The creature also knows 1D4 magic spells from levels 1-3, but with

   themselves demi-gods and gather cult followers or conquering ar-                from numbers 1-7, and knows 1D4 spells from each magic level
   mies. I.Q.: roll 3D4 + 3, roughly equivalent to human intelligence.              1-7. P.P.E. is 2D4x10+10.

6. Average Strength. Physical Strength is usually around 20 or higher;             from the Healer or Sensitive or Physical category (6 powers from
   roll 3D6+ 10 to determine the average P.S. of the species.                      one category) and select six additional psi-powers from the Super
7. Prowess and Endurance. Roll 2D6 + 8 for P.P. and 4D4+ 10 for                    category. I.S.P. is 3D4x10. P.P.E. is 4D6.
   P.E. Attribute.                                                              36-50 Creature of magic. Possesses natural mystic powers. Roll five
8. Speed: Roll percentile.                                                         times or select five powers from the Natural Magic Power table and
      01-20 Equal to a human, roll 3D6.                                            roll once or select one from the Weakness table found in the Super-
      21-50 Fast but still equal to an athletic human, roll 5D6 + 6.               natural Predator section. Plus add 2D6x10 M.D.C to the creature's
      51-80 Fast, equal to many animals, roll 1D6x10 plus 10.                      physical mega-damage structure. P.P.E. is 2D4x10.
      81-00 Superhuman speed, roll 2D6x10 plus 20.                              51-70 Psychic and magic creature. Select two psionic powers from
9. Horror Factor. All monsters have a horror factor. Roll 3D4 + 4.                 each of the psionic power categories, including super. Then select
                                                                                   two spells from each magic level 1- 4. I.S.P. is 2D4x10. P.P.E. is

raw_snippet: Intelligent Supernatural Monsters The intelligent supernatural monsters can appear just as hideous, Mega-damage structure. Like most supernatural creatures, the in- demonic, and inhuman as the predators. They too, often feed on humans telligent monster is the equivalent of a mega-damage structure. This and humanoids, but are much more calculating and clever about it. The means normal weapons do no damage and only mega-damage intelligent monsters are also motivated by needs and desires other than weapons, magic, and, usually, psionics, will have any affect on the an instinct to hunt.
